TopicTitle: Moving Capture Camera too far away from craft causes disintegration in some specific situations

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600 6-core Processor | GPU: NVIDEA GeForce RTX 3060 | RAM: 15.91GB

 

I did a mission to Eve for some cool atmosphere images, but Kerbol was going behind a mountain so I used the Capture camera to get a better view.
Unfortunately, when I went too far, the camera suddenly got out of control, and when I focused to my craft it had fallen into pieces...

In the attached ZIP I have multiple screen recordings of me (trying to) reproduce the bug
I have ONLY been able to reproduce this with the same craft/safe on Eve.

The videos are categorised by name: Location(State)Movement

Key to reproducing: On EVE, the landed craft goes kaboom when I use the Arrow Up key, zooming out didn't trigger disintegration. On Kerbin I never got krakened.
